items.title: We’re Getting a New George Saunders Novel
items.description: A new novel from one of our masters, a news inspired mini rant about celebrity audiobooks, and Joe Biden's book deal are in today's book news.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for July 24, 2025
items.description: Romance at a Spite House, a chilling work of wilderness horror, a mapmaker in Inquisition era Spain, and more of today's best book deals

items.title: New Buzzy Nonfiction Still to Come in 2025
items.description: Three buzzy works of nonfiction you'll want on your TBR that hit shelves later this year.

items.title: Get to Know The Schneider Family Book Awards
items.description: The Schneider Family Book Awards honor the best disability representation in children's literature. Check out some of the winners!

items.title: 5 Queer YA Summer Books to Read in the Sunshine
items.description: There's something about sunshine and fun reads that pair perfectly together. Thse queer YA summer books do it best.
